text:
â”€ Oh, that looks nice, doesn't it?
The new outfit.

...Yeah,
but there might be some parts that are a bit loose.

It's still in the fitting stage,
so adjustments can be made.

If it feels restrictive, I thought about getting it tailored
a bit more after talking to the costume staff.

I see.
It has to be easy to perform in.

They made it the same size as the last outfit, thinking it
hasn't changed much, but I might have lost some weight.
